items.content_html: Electrum Zcash Wallet is a privacy-focused, lightweight wallet for Zcash (ZEC). It offers fast and secure transactions, full support for shielded and transparent addresses, and integration with hardware wallets. Stay decentralized while protecting your financial privacy using Electrum Zcash.
items.title: Electrum-Zcash/electrum-zec: Electrum Zcash Wallet is a privacy-focused, lightweight wallet for Zcash (ZEC). It offers fast and secure transactions, full support for shielded and transparent addresses, and integration with hardware wallets. Stay decentralized while protecting your financial privacy using Electrum Zcash.

items.content_html: Advanced Date Formatter is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides flexible and customizable date formatting options. Easily format dates in various patterns, including full month names, weekdays, ordinal dates, ISO formats, Unix timestamps, and relative time (e.g., "2 days ago"). Perfect for robust date manipulation!
items.title: AKSBhardwaj/AdvancedDateFormatter: Advanced Date Formatter is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides flexible and customizable date formatting options. Easily format dates in various patterns, including full month names, weekdays, ordinal dates, ISO formats, Unix timestamps, and relative time (e.g., "2 days ago"). Perfect for robust date manipulation!

items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.

items.content_html: ⚡️ A lightweight, dependency-free library for generating highly customizable QR codes in browser environments. Leverage SVG to create stunning QR codes with unique designs and embedded logos. Fully documented for Angular and React, with no dependencies and just 40 kB after minification.

Leverage SVG to create stunning QR codes with unique designs and embedded logos. Fully documented for Angular and React, with no dependencies and just 40 kB after minification.
